sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PwdResetUsageInstrumentation</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Generic class for Password Reset Instrumentation via GCF to add Buckets(Dimensions) and Record Usage events. </description>
        <name>PwdResetUsageInstrumentation</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PwdResetUsageInstrumentation = Class.create();
PwdResetUsageInstrumentation.prototype = {

    initialize: function(collectionPoint, collectionEvent) {
        this.collectionPoint = collectionPoint;
        this.collectionEvent = collectionEvent;
        this.bucket = {};
    },

    addBucket: function(key, value) {
        this.bucket[key] = value;
        return this;
    },

    buildUsageEvent: function() {
        var GCFMap = new GCFSampleMap();
        var bucketCount = 0;
        for (var bucketKey in this.bucket) {
            if (bucketCount >= PwdResetGCFConstants.MAX_BUCKETS_LIMIT)
                break;
            GCFMap.put(bucketKey, this.bucket[bucketKey]);
            bucketCount++;
        }
        this._addEventToGCFQueue(GCFMap);
    },

    _addEventToGCFQueue: function(GCFMap) {
        try {
            GCFCollector.recordUsageEvent(PwdResetGCFConstants.CATEGORY, this.collectionPoint, this.collectionEvent, GCFMap);
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.warn("Failed to record Password Reset Usage(GCF) event, Exception: " + ex);
        }
    },

    type: 'PwdResetUsageInstrumentation'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-02-28 20:40:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3438b62153912110f829ddeeff7b127f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PwdResetUsageInstrumentation</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Password Reset" source="com.glideapp.password_reset">1399f4e43cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3438b62153912110f829ddeeff7b127f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-06 19:27:15</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
